name: Pitch Deck
description:
Pitch Deck is a super frantic game about reverting corrupted corporate workers back into humans and freeing them from their corporate shackles by using augmentation gloves with sick powers!

CONTROLS:

  • Move: WASD Keys/Left Stick
  • Look: Mouse/Right Stick
  • Jump: Space/A Button
  • Left Ability: Left Click/L2
  • Right Ability: Right Click/R2
  • Shuffle Left: Q/L1
  • Shuffle Right: E/R1
  • Block: Left Ctrl/RB

#action #roguelike #other
